item.title: How to edit shops in a 667/721
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Go to [size=10pt]source / data / items[/size] and open in the folder unpackedShops.txt.

You will see this -

//key money boolean(general store) - Name - item quantity and repeat 1 995 true - Edgeville General Store - 2436 100 2440 100 2442 100 2434 100 2444 100 3040 100 15332 200 20771 40 6685 100

“1” is the number of the shop, “995” is the currency, “true” is whether you can sell anything, “Edgeville General Store” is the name. The numbers like “2436, 2440 and 2442” are items. The “100s” after are quantities.

Edit your new items into there.

Delete packedShops.s in the folder.

There, compile and run.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit shops in a 667/721
